text.div:
HSPC Respiratory Rate Units of Measure Value Set

The list of codes that describe the units of measure used for respiratory rate.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
    CodeDisplay
    HzHertz
    {Breaths}/minBreaths / minute

name: HSPC Respiratory Rate Units of Measure Value Set
description: The list of codes that describe the units of measure used for respiratory rate.
copyright: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement
